mlflex.learners
Class AbstractMachineLearner

java.lang.Object
  mlflex.learners.AbstractMachineLearner
Direct Known Subclasses:
C5Learner, GenericArffLearner, OrangeLearner, RandomMachineLearner, RLearner, WekaLearner
public abstract class AbstractMachineLearner
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides a template for classes that perform general machine-learning tasks. It can be overridden with custom classes that implement these tasks for new third-party packages or for custom implementation.

Author:
Stephen Piccolo

AbstractMachineLearner

public AbstractMachineLearner()
Method Detail

SelectOrRankFeatures

public abstract java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> SelectOrRankFeatures(java.lang.String commandTemplate,
                                                                           java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> algorithmParameters,
                                                                           DataInstanceCollection trainData)
                                                                    throws java.lang.Exception
This method is used by custom machine learner classes either 1) to select features that the algorithm determines to be most relevant to the dependent variable, or 2) to rank all features according to their relevance to the dependent variable. If feature selection is used, the features should still be ranked, if possible.

Parameters:
commandTemplate -
algorithmParameters - General parameter values that are used by the machine learner to execute. These are usually stored in the FeatureSelectionParameters.txt file in the Config directory.
trainData - Training data instances
Returns:
A list of data point names, ranked according to their perceived relevance to the dependent variable
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

TrainTest

public abstract ModelPredictions TrainTest(java.lang.String commandTemplate,
                                           java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> classificationParameters,
                                           DataInstanceCollection trainingData,
                                           DataInstanceCollection testData)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
This method is used by custom machine learner classes to perform classification.

Parameters:
commandTemplate -
classificationParameters - General parameter values that are used by the machine learner to perform classification. These parameters are usually stored in the ClassificationParameters.txt file in the Config directory.
trainingData - Training data instances
testData - Test data instances
Returns:
Predictions for each test data instance
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
